name: Orbital Injection
description: Grab planets and toss them into a stable orbit.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater. Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
